root.name: Sea Dogs
root.description: OverviewSea dogs is a pirate-themed, non-linear Role-playing game developed by Akella and published by Bethesda Softworks on November 24 2004.The game features naval combat, business management, simulation, and role-playing elements. The player has the choice to make allies with the Spanish, French, English, or no faction at all.System RequirementsComponentsModel/sizeCPU233 MHzRAM64MBHard Disk Space650 MBOperating SystemWindows 95
